title: A Witness and a Warning: A Modern-Day Prophet Testifies of the Book of Mormon
description: The Book of Mormon is meant for our day for us here and now. In A Witness and a Warning you will find President Benson's counsel, insight, testimony and teachings pertaining to the Book of Mormon. As you study this book along with the Book of Mormon you will find blessings and fulfillment of the promises made by a modern day prophet of God.
author: Ezra Taft Benson
